title: SKImage.Encode returns null rather than throwing an Exception when wrong paramters are passed.

comments.author: mattleibow
comments.body:
Thanks for reporting this. I looked into it and it is rather a limitation of the PNG encoder:
https://github.com/google/skia/blob/97598a506158baff7ba473d5c032b42b2d7a8740/src/images/SkPngEncoder.cpp#L98-L154

It appears that `Alpha8` is not supported. I think this is a limitation of the actual PNG codec.

comments.author: jvanlangen
comments.body: It's 2022 and this still is an issue.
